update user
username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
nickname = #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
age = #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER},
head = #{head,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update user set username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, nickname = #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, age = #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER}, head = #{head,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
